original_title: Το κορίτσι που δεν μπορούσε να κοιμηθεί
overview: The open-eyed girl is waiting for the alarm clock to ring. He hasn't slept tonight. He hasn't slept many nights. Her day starts normally, but nothing normal happens. Its course changes as time passes, as the "signs" she meets on her way lead her somewhere else, somewhere far away, somewhere she will finally be able to close her eyes and rest. The film was made in the context of the 5th Panorama Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki with the theme DEACTIVATION.
title: The girl who couldn’t sleep
